text: haey( chaur changcha) nowpel del yeung ban brab anak ( mou ham meat) tha pitabrakd nasa mcheasa robsa anakdoeng chruotachreab ampi mnoussa lok . haey yeung minban bangkeut nouv chakkhovisay del yeung ban bangheanh anak( now yb ai sar k mie k r ch) ning daemchheu ( hsaoe k kou m) del trauv ke dakbandasa( del ban pnrnea)nowknong kompir kuor an laey leuklengte chea karsaakalbong samreab mnoussa lok bonnaoh . haey yeung ban banleach puokke( nouv tearounakamm) haey trong min banthem dl puokke krawpi kar v nge v ng da sen chhngay noh laey
